column2: "Nna Hanna bɔɔ mpaa na ɔsee dɛ
column3: M’akoma dzi ehurusi wɔ EWURADZE mu
column4: M’ambɛn ama do wɔ EWURADZE mu: M’anomu atrɛ wɔ m’atamfo do
column5: Osiandɛ m’enyi gye wɔ wo nkwagye no mu."

column2: "Obiara nnyɛ krɔnkrɔn dɛ EWURADZE; Na obiara nnyi hɔ ka wo ho: Nkyii so ɔbotan bi nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn."
"Mma hom nnkasa ahohyehyɛ mu pii dɛm bio; Mma hom mma ahopɔwsɛm mmfi hom anomu mmpue: Na EWURADZE nye Nyankopɔn a ohu adze nyinara
column3: Na ɔno na oker ndzeyɛɛ."

column2: "Mbarimba akatakyi egyen ebubu
column3: Na mberɛwyɛfo dze
column4: wɔdze ahoɔdzen bɔ hɔnho do."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔmee no woekedzi edziban ho paa; Na hɔn a ɔkɔm dze hɔn no kɔm egyaa: Nyew
column3: ɔbɔnyin awo esuon; Na nyia ɔwɔ mba pii no yɛ ɔhokwafo."

column2: "EWURADZE na oku
column3: na ɔma nkwa: Ɔno na ɔma wosian kɔ Samanadze
column4: na ɔma wɔfow pue."

column2: "EWURADZE yɛ obi ohianyi
column3: na ɔyɛ obi so osikanyi: Ɔno na ɔbrɛ obi adze
column4: ɔnoara so na ɔma obi do."

column2: "Ɔma ohianyi do fi huntuma mu
column3: Ɔma ɔkwahweaban do fi suminado
column4: Dɛ ɔbɛma wɔnye mbapɔmba atsena
column5: Na woenya enyimnyam ahengua do atsena: Osiandɛ asaase n’edum yɛ EWURADZE dze

column2: "Ɔbɔhwɛ n’ahotseweefo anan do
column3: Na emumuyɛfo dze wɔbɔtɔ mmum wɔ sum mu; Osiandɛ nyimpa biara nnkodua ahoɔdzen do edzi nyim."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔnye EWURADZE dzi aperper no wɔbɔdweredwerew hɔn; Ɔbɔtow asenaman wɔ sor egu hɔn do; EWURADZE bobu asaase nyina atsɛn; Na ɔdze ahoɔdzen ama ne hen
column3: Na ɔama ne nyia wɔasera no ngo no n’ambɛn do."

column2: "Na Elkana kɔr ne fie wɔ Rama. Na abofra no soom EWURADZE wɔ ɔsɔfo Eli enyim."
"Afei Eli mba no yɛ asoɔdzenfo a wɔmmfa enyidzi mma EWURADZE."
"Nna asɔfo no atɔrmuadze a wɔdze yɛ ɔman no nye dɛ
column3: sɛ nyimpa bi bɔbɔ afɔr a
column4: aber a wɔronoa nam no
column5: nna ɔsɔfo no no somfo aba
column6: kitsa edzinam a n’ano ebiasa wɔ ne nsamu;"

column2: "na ɔdze abɔwɔ sɛn
column3: anaa dadzehyera
column4: anaa dadzesɛn
column5: anaa kutu no mu; na dza edzinam no dze bɛba nyinara na ɔsɔfo no afa. Mbrɛ wɔdze yɛɛ Israelfo a wɔbaa Siloh hɔ nyinara nye no."

column2: "Nyew
column3: ansaana wɔrebɛhyew seradze no
column4: nna ɔsɔfo no no somfo aba abɛse nyimpa a ɔrobɔ afɔr no dɛ
column5: Ma nam ma wɔnkɔtoto mma ɔsɔfo; na ɔrenngye wo hɔ nam a wɔanoa

column2: "Na sɛ ɔka dɛ
column3: Wɔrebɛhyew seradze no seseiara
column4: na nkyii afa dodow biara a wo kra kɔn dɔ a; ɔsomfo no bua no dɛ
column6: na fa ma me seseiara: na sɛ annyɛ no dɛm a

column2: "Na mberantsɛ no hɔn bɔn yɛɛ kɛse dodoodow wɔ EWURADZE enyim: na wobuu EWURADZE afɔrbɔdze no enyimtsia."
"Naaso Samuel dze ɔsomee wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: dɛ ɔyɛ abofra a wɔdze ndwera asɔfontar abɔ no do."

column2: "Nkyii so afrenhyia biara ne na paam bataker kakraba
column3: na ɔdze brɛɛ no
column4: aber a ɔnye no kun ba bɔbɔ afrenhyia afɔr no."

column2: "Na Eli hyiraa Elkana na ne yer
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: EWURADZE mma wo asefo wɔ ɔbaa yi mu wɔ akyɛdze a ɔdze akyɛ EWURADZE yi ntsi. Na wosii mu kɔr hɔnankasa hɔn fie."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɛseraa Hanna
column3: na onyinsenii
column4: na ɔwoo mbabanyin baasa na mbabaa beenu. Na abofra Samuel no nyinii wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Afei nna Eli ayɛ akɔdaa dodow; na ɔtsee dza ne mbabanyin no dze yɛɛ Israel nyinara
column3: na mbrɛ wosi fefa mbaa a wɔbɛyɛɛ edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no ano no nye hɔn deda."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom yɛ adze a ɔtse dɛm yi? Na metse hom ndzeyɛɛ bɔn ho nsɛm wɔ nyimpa yi nyinara ano."

column2: "Dabi da
column3: me mba; iyi nnyɛ atsenka pa bi na metse no hom ho yi."

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa bi yɛ no nua nyimpa bɔn a
column3: Nyankopɔn bedzi ama no: na sɛ nyimpa bi yɛ EWURADZE bɔn a
column4: woana na ɔbɛpa kyɛw ama no? Naaso woenntsie hɔn egya ne ndze
column5: osiandɛ nna ɔyɛ EWURADZE ne nhyehyɛɛ dɛ wɔbɔtotɔr."

column2: "Na abofra Samuel no kɔr do araa nyinii
column3: na n’enyim baa nyam wɔ EWURADZE
column4: na nyimpa nyina enyim."

column2: "Dabi
column3: nkɔnhyɛnyi bi baa Eli nkyɛn
column4: na ɔbɛsee no dɛ
column6: Ana nnyɛ moho na medaa no edzi kyerɛɛ w’egya fie

column2: "Ana nnyɛ emi na mesaan mu miyii no wɔ Israel mbusuakuw nyinara mu dɛ ombedzi mo sɔfoe
column3: na ɔnkɔ m’afɔrmbukyia ho nkɛhyew eduhuam
column4: na ɔnhyɛ asɔfontar wɔ m’enyim? Ana nnyɛ emi na medze Israelmba hɔn ogya afɔrbɔdze nyinara maa w’egya fie no?"

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom tsiatsia mo kum afɔr na m’edziban afɔr a mahyɛ wɔ me tsenabea do; na idzi wo mba nyi sen me; dɛ hom dze me man Israel ayɛyɛdze nyinara mu dza odzi mu yɛ homho yie?"
"Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: ɔse dɛ
column5: Ampa mesee dɛ wo fie na w’egya fie nnantsew wɔ m’enyim daa: na afei dze EWURADZE se dɛ
column6: Ɔmpar me koraa; na mibedzi hɔn a wodzi me nyi no nyi
column7: na hɔn a wobu me enyimtsia no dze

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: nda reba a mubotwa w’abasa
column4: na w’egya fie abasa
column5: amma akɔdaa bi aannka wɔ wo fie hɔ."

column2: "Na ibohu ahohiahia wɔ me tsenabea hɔ
column3: wɔ ahonya a Nyankopɔn dze bɛma Israel no nyinara mu; na akɔdaa bi rennka wo fie hɔ dabiarada."

column2: "Na wo nyimpa no a munnkotwa no mefi m’afɔrmbukyia ho akyen no
column3: wɔ hɔ dɛ ɔbɛma w’enyiwa ayɛ siamoo
column4: na ɔahow wo werɛ: na wo fie na dodow nyinara bowuwu wɔ hɔn mberantsɛber mu."

column2: "Na iyi bɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ama wo
column3: dza ɔbɛba wo mbabanyin beenu no
column4: Hofni na Finehas do no; da kor na hɔn beenu nyina bowuwu."

column2: "Na mebɛma ɔsɔfo nokwafo bi do ama moho a
column3: ɔbɛyɛ dza ɔwɔ m’akoma mu na m’adwen mu: na mebɛkyekyer ofie a otsim ama no; na ɔbɛnantsew nyia masera no no enyim daa."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: obiara a ɔbɛka wɔ wo fie mu no ɔbɛba abɔbɔ no mu adze ama no agye dwetɛbona na paanoo ntɔwmu
column4: na ɔase dɛ
column6: fa me hyɛ asɔfodwuma no mu kor bi mu
column7: ama meenya paanoo sin bi edzi."
